Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the online publication of information relating to stop work orders issued by the department of buildings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Online publication of information relating to stop work orders issued by the department of buildings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting multiple dwellings with numerous code violations.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reporting multiple dwellings with numerous code violations.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring multiple dwelling owners to provide notice to their tenants prior to temporarily or permanently making building amenities unavailable.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring multiple dwelling owners to provide notice to their tenants prior to temporarily or permanently making building amenities unavailable.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the online publication of information relating to stop work orders issued by the department of buildings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Online publication of information relating to stop work orders issued by the department of buildings.
